      • lineTo

        public void lineTo(double base,
          double heightFromBackbone,
          Direction direction)
        Description copied from interface: SequencePath
        Draws a line from the current coordinates to the new coordinates. The line will be straight in sequence coordinates, but may be curved in actual coordinates.
        Specified by:
        lineTo in interface SequencePath
        Parameters:
        base - The base on the sequence.
        heightFromBackbone - The height from the backbone of this point.

        heightFromBackbone - The height from the backbone to draw to.
